author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dx.Com Holdings Expects To Record Loss After Tax For HY Ended Dec. 31, 2017
text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Dx.Com Holdings Ltd:
* GROUP EXPECTED TO RECORD LOSS AFTER TAX OF ABOUT HK$38 MILLION TO HK$42 MILLION FOR HY ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* ‍EXPECTED LOSS DUE TO REALISED LOSS ON DISPOSAL OF AVAILABLE-FOR-SALE INVESTMENTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
